content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In this negotiation in regard to the modern, well-located one-bedroom apartment, I aim for the most affordable deal. Let's start with a significantly reduced rate, perhaps 800 Euros a month, as I'm a student and prioritize a budget-friendly option.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low for my expectations. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective but disappointed with the impasse. Nonetheless, TERMINATE.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
